mapper.insert: INSERT INTO paper (exam_code, exam_grade_sub_id, batch_num, paper_img, paper_status, error_status) VALUES (#{stuExamNo}, #{egsId}, #{batchNum}, #{paperImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) on duplicate key update batch_num=VALUES(batch_num), paper_img=VALUES(paper_img), paper_status=VALUES(paper_status), error_status=VALUES(error_status), id=LAST_INSERT_ID(id)
mapper.select: SELECT id from paper WHERE exam_code=#{examCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and exam_grade_sub_id=#{egsId}
mapper.delete: DELETE from paper where exam_grade_sub_id=#{egsId} and batch_num=#{batchNum}
mapper.select: SELECT p.exam_code examCode,ee.name,p.id paperid,p.paper_img paperImg,oa.id,oa.quesno,oa.answer,p.paper_status status,p.error_status errorStatus FROM paper p LEFT JOIN obj_answer oa ON p.id=oa.paperid LEFT JOIN examinee ee ON p.exam_code=ee.exam_code where p.exam_grade_sub_id=#{egsId} and ee.schid=#{schId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.paper_status='2' and p.error_status='2'
mapper.update: UPDATE paper SET paper_status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{paperid}
